4304860.description:
Welcome to "Ayanami Tenchi's HIT&BLOW," the Twitch streamer support app!

ğŸ”¶Introduction (Summary)

This app supports Twitch streamer Ayanami Tenchi.

Simple and fun puzzle-style mini-games for everyone to enjoy, all with the adorable Tenchi.

Players must guess the unique four-digit numbers secretly created by streamer Ayanami Tenchi!

Start playing immediately after installation. There are no Steam account linking or in-app purchases.

While incorporating the streamer's unique worldview, the game can also be enjoyed as a standalone game.

ğŸ”¶Game Features

Official collaboration with popular streamer Ayanami Tenchi

No in-app purchases or account linking

Simple yet deep gameplay focused on numerical deduction

Tenchi's hints and reactions make deductions more intuitive

ğŸ”¶How to Play

First, enter a random four-digit number!

If the number and location are correct, it will be displayed as a "HIT." If the number is correct but the location is incorrect, it will be displayed as a "BLOW."

Use the log, Tenchi's hints, viewer comments, and more to guess the correct number!

ğŸ”¶Three Play Modes

Beginner Mode

HIT and BLOW are color-coded, so even beginners can feel at ease!

Practice Mode

Use hints and viewer comments to hone your deductive skills!

Ranked Mode

Your rank is determined by the number of attempts! Keep an eye on Tenchi's reactions!

*This game does not require registration or login to any external services.

*If you think Tenchi is cute, please follow her on Twitch.
